name: Haven (itch) (Lion's Tooth)
description:
Welcome to Haven, a place where you can talk about your worries without fear of being judged.

Meet Hana, a girl who needs your help.

Can you guide her through her doubts or will you discover something about yourself?

Features:

- Choices that help steer the conversation

- Relaxing classical songs

- 2 possible endings

- Fully free

- No ads
